edu.rit.numeric

Class XYSeries.Fit

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.numeric.XYSeries.Fit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function
    Enclosing class:
    XYSeries

    public static class XYSeries.Fit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function
    Class XYSeries.Fit holds the results of a least squares fit of an XYSeries to a model that is a linear combination of basis functions. A Fit object is also a Function that can be used to evaluate the fitted model y = Σi (ai ⋅ Fi(x)).
    See Also:
    XYSeries.linearFit(Function[])
